book.title: Seven Pillars of Wisdom
book.description: 简介： Seven Pillars of Wisdom is the autobiographical account of the experiences of British soldier T. E. Lawrence (Lawrence of Arabia), while serving as a liaison officer with rebel forces during the Arab Revolt against the Ottoman Turks of 1916 to 1918....
